body.p: includes a specialized YAML editor with various editing features for files that have the json file extension. It includes the usual text editing actions, syntax highlighting, and automatic indenting. also includes a document template to help you get started with YAML documents. The template is called YAML and it can be found in the New Document folder in the New document wizardNew from templates wizard.You can experiment with a sample of a YAML file available at: [OXYGEN-INSTALL-DIR]/samples/yaml/personal.yaml.
